location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 5 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Assistant Surgeon James Pringle Riach had arrived at Bushire and had resumed medical charge of the Residency. The letter also reports that Assistant Surgeon Henry Johnston, on being relieved at Bushire, had proceeded to his station at Bussora [Basra] on board the Sophia.
